rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central communal space with natural lighting and ventilation; designed according to Vastu principles for harmony.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious room with a private balcony overlooking the garden; wheelchair accessible doorways and interior layout.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom ensuring ample space for accessibility; includes built-in wardrobes following eco-friendly materials.

rooms.name: Third Bedroom
rooms.description: Compact yet functional bedroom with access to natural light and ventilation; integrated storage solutions.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed for ease of movement with wheelchair accessibility and energy-efficient appliances.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan dining space adjacent to the living area; natural light maximized by large windows.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Cozy library with abundant storage for books and a dedicated reading nook; designed in accordance with Vastu principles for intellectual growth.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible bathroom with grab bars and easy-to-use fixtures; eco-friendly water conservation fixtures installed.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bath designed for accessibility with wide doorways and ample space for movement; energy-efficient fixtures.

openings.description: The north-facing entrance is designed to welcome positive energy as per Vastu principles and ensures accessibility for wheelchair users with a ramp.
Balcony access to the master bedroom for natural ventilation and scenic views; integrated wheelchair-friendly design.
